sys_script.name: Publication Creation

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_802e1ba747b26510691e7258946d43e0
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>false</action_delete> <action_insert>true</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>x_431105_cand_ass_assessment</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition table="x_431105_cand_ass_assessment">publication_type=open_to_other_institutions^EQ<item display_value="Open to other institutions" endquery="false" field="publication_type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="open_to_other_institutions"/> <item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/> </filter_condition> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Publication Creation</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {
var STAGE_LIBRARY_TABLE = 'x_431105_cand_ass_stage_library'; var CANDIDATE_STAGE_TABLE = 'x_431105_cand_ass_publication_stage';
var grCandidateStage = new GlideRecord(CANDIDATE_STAGE_TABLE); var grStageLibrary = new GlideRecord(STAGE_LIBRARY_TABLE); grStageLibrary.addEncodedQuery('parent!=NULL^open_to_other_institution=true'); grStageLibrary.query(); while (grStageLibrary.next()) { grCandidateStage.initialize(); grCandidateStage.publication = current.sys_id; grCandidateStage.stage = grStageLibrary.sys_id; grCandidateStage.order = grStageLibrary.order; grCandidateStage.insert(); } })(current, previous);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>nappoma</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2023-05-20 18:08:07</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>802e1ba747b26510691e7258946d43e0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Publication Creation</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Talent NOW" source="x_431105_cand_ass">3aeff01497c02110a4deb9dfe153afb4</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Talent NOW">3aeff01497c02110a4deb9dfe153afb4</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_802e1ba747b26510691e7258946d43e0</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2023-05-21 15:05:59</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>after</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=802e1ba747b26510691e7258946d43e0"/> </record_update>
